0.9.4.name: wordpress/trung-presszen
0.9.4.description:
This is an extension for Wordpress to integrate ZenPhoto into your Wordpress installation. It required ZenPhoto installed on the same server and very easy to install (thanks to Wordpress easy plug-in system). ver 0.9.4 : - fix error when misconfigured the path of ZP. - Pagination - Installation instruction for ZP 1.1.7

ATTENTION : FROM VERSION 1.1.7 OF ZENPHOTO, STEP 2 ARE NOLONGER REQUIRED, SKIP IT IF YOUR ZP VERSION > 1.1.7
